summary: Desktop header Admin Panel button was updated to a deep pink, high-visibility button shown only when `isAdmin` is true, with hover and focus-visible ring styling. The diff is truncated before any mobile menu code, so mobile menu styling/behavior cannot be verified. Two additional non-requested metadata/documentation files were modified.

missing_requirements.requirement: Apply the same deep pink, high-visibility Admin Panel button styling to the mobile menu entry (and keep it readable), including hover/active/focus states with an accessible focus indicator.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/src/components/Header.tsx` is truncated before any mobile menu rendering is shown, so there is no evidence that the Admin Panel entry in the mobile menu was updated to match the desktop deep pink button styling and interaction states.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added project tracking metadata in project_state.json (new_feature_requests entries AR-1/AR-2 marked pending).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks for UI styling changes in the header; it does not request changes to project tracking/metadata files.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend-file-summaries.txt with broad descriptions of many UI/feature changes across the app (footer, categories, admin dashboard, theme tokens, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requests the Admin Panel header navigation styling update; updating this summary file (and especially describing unrelated changes) was not requested.
